Text: Says "game needs to update your directx" i have the latest installation. Says please insert disk #1 to install direct x even though i have disk 1 uploaded using daemon tools.

Clean, worked well.  Will seed as often as possible (ie, when not at school)

If you are gonna get Armed and Dangerous, I recommend this version.

What are the steps to get this to work?

(sign) unmount disc 1, mount disc 2, complete install. then move crack.exe to gamedata folder & click to play. 10x peat!
